tool.name: metabomatching
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**Authors**
| **Rico Rueedi (metabomatching@unil.ch)
----------- Description ----------- metabomatching identifies metabolites using genetic spiking. A basic description is provided below, full documentation here https://github.com/rrueedi/metabomatching-pre/blob/master/documentation/howto.pdf
----------- Input Files -----------
Association Statistics Dataset (Pseudospectra) | This (1+3K)-column tab-separated file contains the association statistics (effect size, standard error, and p-value) for the K variables on which metabomatching is to be run |
Parameters | This two-column tab-separated file controls both the way metabomatching is run and the way results are displayed. |
------------ Output Files ------------
Scores | This (3+K)-column tab-separated file contains the metabomatching scores for the K provided pseudospectra, with one row for each reference metabolite |
Figure (PDF) | The results, presented as a K page PDF file. |
